channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Strike on Iran Was Constitutional
item.description: The president acted to protect the nation’s security within the powers granted to his office by the Constitution.

item.title: What Supporters of Illegal Immigration Don’t Understand
item.description: To believe it is a problem is to assert that American citizenship means something.

item.title: Biden Admin Let 729 Iranian Border-Crossers Loose Into America: Report
item.description: The lack of border security under the Biden administration undermined national security on multiple fronts.

item.title: L.A. Sheriff’s Dept. Apologizes For Post Saying ‘Hearts Go Out To Victims’ Of U.S. Strike On Iran’s Nuclear Sites
item.description: The Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department on Sunday removed and apologized for its social media post sympathizing with the “victims and families imp...

item.title: How Did New York City Get Here?
item.description: In truth, the city’s political culture has been dying for some time. The mayoral race is just the most recent evidence.

item.title: NYT Casually Admits USAID Squandered Money But Still Laments Its Closure
item.description: Around 1,000 USAID programs are still alive, and now managed through the State Department. The U.S. is still doing good internationally.

item.title: 3 Takeaways From The U.S. Bombing Of Iran’s Nuclear Sites
item.description: The bombings are a powerful deterrent to the 'CRINK' alliance; talk of America’s decline is merely wishful thinking; and leadership matters.

item.title: Trump urges Congress to dial up heat on 'hardheaded' Fed Chair Powell

item.title: Democrats Warned About Unelected, Rogue Judges — Until Trump Started Fighting Them
item.description: Everything Democrats warned about before Trump returned to office is exactly what they're either now celebrating or dismissing.

item.title: Florida asks Supreme Court to revive state's immigration crackdown law

item.title: Dobbs Transformed America
item.description: The work is unfinished, but we shouldn’t understate the significance of the ruling three years ago today.
